attributes.action: call a general election for October 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A general election in October 2009 would force each sitting MP to justify their record in relation to their expenses, giving voters in every constituency in the country a say on their MP's financial conduct,and so restore legitimacy to Parliament at this time of great national difficulty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
